name: ECS Services should use the latest platform version
query:
{
  ecsServices(where: {NOT: { platformVersion_IN: ["LATEST", ""] }}) {
    identifier
    accountID
    cloudAccountID
    cloudAccountName
    cloudProvider
    idFromProvider
    internalAssetType
    internalName
    internalRegion
    assetCategory
    contentHash
  }
}
